title: Third Month Fair
content: The Third Month Fair (Bai language: salwa zix[note 1]) is one of the most important festivals celebrated by the Bai people of southwest China.[1][2] It includes a street bazaar, performances, sports, and games, and takes place annually in Dali City, Yunnan. The fair lasts several days, starting on the 15th day of the third month of the Chinese calendar (in April or May of the Gregorian calendar).[2][4][8] In 2024, it begins on April 23.[9]
